document_data.name: Illithiderro
document_data.mainbody: '''Illithiderro''' were hybrid [[ceremorphosis|ceremorph]]s that resulted from the cross-breeding of [[derro]] and [[mind flayer]]s.
document_data.Ecology: However they reproduced, illithiderro were a highly prolific race of ceremorphs.
document_data.History: The illithiderro were the result of a bizarre illithid breeding experiment performed in the lower levels of the city of [[Gauntlgrym]]. In just ten years the madminds outnumbered the mind flayers and, craving freedom, rebelled and slaughtered their former masters before claiming their territory.
